scripts.start: npm run dev & npm run server
scripts.deploy:node: scp -r /Users/trastor/code/play root@81.68.255.143:/root/ && ssh root@81.68.255.143 'cd /root/play && docker build -f Dockerfile.node -t play-backend . && docker stop play-backend 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm play-backend 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d --name play-backend -p 6015:6015 --restart unless-stopped play-backend'
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run build:server && rm -rf temp_deploy && mkdir temp_deploy && cp -r dist nginx Dockerfile Dockerfile.node package.json package-lock.json temp_deploy/ && mkdir -p temp_deploy/dist && cp -r server/* temp_deploy/dist/ && tar -czf deploy.tar.gz -C temp_deploy . && scp deploy.tar.gz root@81.68.255.143:/root/ && rm -rf temp_deploy deploy.tar.gz && ssh root@81.68.255.143 'rm -rf /root/play && mkdir -p /root/play && cd /root/play && tar -xzf ../deploy.tar.gz && rm ../deploy.tar.gz && docker stop vueApp play-backend 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm vueApp play-backend 2>/dev/null || true && docker build -t vuenginxcontainer . && docker build -f Dockerfile.node -t play-backend . && docker run -d --name vueApp -p 80:80 --restart unless-stopped vuenginxcontainer && docker run -d --name play-backend -p 6015:6015 --restart unless-stopped play-backend && docker ps'
